signUpMailTemplate.subject: [Techvisio] Please confirm your email address
signUpMailTemplate.body:
Hi,

{{ clientName }}

Thank you for choosing techvisio

Your client Code is {{ clientCode }}

{{ serverUrl }}' click here to verify and activate your account.

Thanks,

The Techvisio Team

resetPasswordMailTemplate.subject: [Techvisio] New password generated
resetPasswordMailTemplate.body:
Hi,

{{ fullName }}

You recently requested to reset your password for your techvisio account.

your new password provided below you can change it after login.

Password - {{ password }}

User Name - {{ userName }}

Client Code - {{ clientCode }}

Thanks,

The Techvisio Team

candidateUserMailTemplate.subject: [Techvisio] Login details for candidate
candidateUserMailTemplate.body:
Hi,

{{ fullName }}

Your new account has been created.

your account details provided below, use for login.

Password - {{ password }}

User Name - {{ userName }}

Client Code - {{ clientCode }}

Thanks,

The Techvisio Team

candidateExamMailTemplate.subject: [Techvisio] exam link
candidateExamMailTemplate.body:
Hi,

{{ firstName }}

An exam has been created for you

{{ serverUrl }}' click here to start your exam.

Thanks,

The Techvisio Team
